title: Is This Just Hand Lettering?
content:
I want to know what the main type that says Bom Dia is on this bottle. Any clues?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021023141im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bom%20Dia%20lettering_5927.jpg)
author: Byronb81

comments.content:
It may be hand lettering (it's hard to prove with no duplicate letters), but it is very similar to [Gizmo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021023141/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=GTT0000006) by our compatriot here, Nick Cooke.

- Mike Yanega

I think its might be Gizmo or a variation of it.

[http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=gizmo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021023141/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=gizmo "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=gizmo")

Definitely too close for my liking.

Nick Cooke

Well, that answers one question, Nick – you didn't do this as a customization for them.

- Mike Yanega
